Course: Diploma in Culinary Arts of Italian Cuisine
Eligiblity:
Candidates who have successfully completed the Bachelor of Hotel Management programme are eligible for the Culinary Arts Diploma in Italian Cuisines.
The diploma in culinary arts programme is taught at the beautiful palace of Colorno in Parma, Italy which also happens to be the headquarters of ALMA, the world renowned culinary arts training and education centre in Italy. Students who have the qualifications for culinary school get to learn the intricacies of Italian cuisine from master chefs from around the world who also serve as teachers at this esteemed institute.
The infrastructure is world-class and all provisions are available for the best learning experience. Since the admission criteria for the culinary diploma is a Bachelor’s in Hotel Management, it is most likely that the student will have a prior understanding of the nitty-gritties of service and culinary-awareness.
Students will get to interact with the masters of cooking from around-the-world and will be taught hands-on during their course. This is an once-in-a-lifetime opportunity for students to come forward and experience the charm of working with the leaders in the field.
AIMS Institutes has come up with the Diploma in Culinary Arts to fulfill the dreams of those students who wish to pursue a career in international cuisines and possess the passion and skills to meet the culinary arts requirements. The diploma from ALMA give them a much needed boost to live their dreams in international culinary skills.
Course_Detail:
